https://schema.humancellatlas.org/system.description: Provenance information added or generated at time of ingest.
https://schema.humancellatlas.org/system.title: Provenance
https://schema.humancellatlas.org/system.name: provenance

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_major_version.description: The major version number of the schema.

schema_minor_version.description: The minor version number of the schema.

submission_date.description: When project was first submitted to database.

submitter_id.description: ID of individual who first submitted project.

updater_id.description: ID of individual who last updated project.

document_id.comment: This structure supports the current ingest API. It may change in the future.

accession.description: A unique accession for this entity, provided by the broker.

https://schema.humancellatlas.org/core/p.description: Information about an intended protocol that was followed in the project.
https://schema.humancellatlas.org/core/p.title: Protocol core
https://schema.humancellatlas.org/core/p.name: protocol_core

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

protocol_id.description: A unique ID for the protocol.
protocol_id.guidelines: Protocol ID should have no spaces.

protocol_name.description: A short name for the protocol.

protocol_description.description: A general description of the protocol.

publication_doi.description: The publication digital object identifier (doi) for the protocol.

protocols_io_doi.description: The protocols.io digital object identifier (doi) for the protocol.

document.description: A filename of a PDF document containing the details of the protocol.

https://schema.humancellatlas.org/module.description: A term that may be associated with a process-related ontology term.
https://schema.humancellatlas.org/module.title: Process type ontology
https://schema.humancellatlas.org/module.name: process_type_ontology

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

text.description: The name of a process type being used.

ontology.description: An ontology term identifier in the form prefix:accession.

ontology_label.description: The preferred label for the ontology term referred to in the ontology field. This may differ from the user-supplied value in the text field.

https://schema.humancellatlas.org/type/p.description: Information about the biomaterial collection protocol.
https://schema.humancellatlas.org/type/p.title: Collection protocol
https://schema.humancellatlas.org/type/p.name: collection_protocol
